en: Jehovah answer thee in the day of trouble; The name of the God of Jacob set thee up on high;
hmr: Lunginzing ni chun LALPA- IN dawn raw se che, Jakob Pathien hming chun hmun insângah dawm kai raw se che;

en: Send thee help from the sanctuary, And strengthen thee out of Zion;
hmr: Hmun inthienga inthawk chun ṭhangpuina tirpêk sienla che, Ziona inthawk chun sukhrât raw se che.

en: Remember all thy offerings, And accept thy burnt-sacrifice; [Selah
hmr: I thilinhlân po po chu hre zing sienla, I pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu lâwm raw se.

en: Grant thee thy heart’s desire, And fulfil all thy counsel.
hmr: I lungril dit zâwng chu pe phal sienla che, I remruot po po chu inhlawtlingtir raw se che.

en: We will triumph in thy salvation, And in the name of our God we will set up our banners: Jehovah fulfil all thy petitions.
hmr: I sandamnaa chun hlimin hla sak ka ta, Ei Pathien hmingin ei puonzâr- hai hi la zâr ei tih: LALPA chun i hnina po po inhlawtlingtir raw se che.

en: Now know I that Jehovah saveth his anointed; He will answer him from his holy heaven With the saving strength of his right hand.
hmr: LALPAIN a hrieknâl hi a sandam ti tuhin ka hriet tah a, A kut changtieng sandamna thain, A vân inthienga inthawk khin ama la dawn a tih.

en: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses; But we will make mention of the name of Jehovah our God.
hmr: Ṭhenkhatin tawlailîrhai an ring a, ṭhenkhatin sakawrhai an ring a, Keini ruok chun LALPA kan Pathien hming chu lam lem kan tih.

en: They are bowed down and fallen; But we are risen, and stand upright.
hmr: Anni chu an kûn a, an tlu tah a, Keini ruok chu kan tho a, kan ngîr tlûn ta lem a,

en: Save, Jehovah: Let the King answer us when we call.
hmr: LALPA, sandam rawh, Kan ko pha chun Laltak chun mi dawn raw se.
